Module: camera

camera

Camera API. All functions require valid camera object ID. Constraints and standard translation/rotation functions also supported.
Source:
  • ext/camera.js, line 3

Members

Camera movement style.

        <static> rotate(camobj, angle_h_delta, angle_v_delta)

        camobj Camera Object ID
        angle_h_delta Number Horizontal angle in radians

        <static> rotate_pivot(camobj, angle_h_delta, angle_v_delta)

        Rotate MS_TARGET_CONTROLS camera about pivot point. +h from left to right (CCW around Y) +v down (CCW around DIR x Y)
        Parameters:
        Name Type Description
        camobj Camera Object ID
        angle_h_delta Number Horizontal angle in radians
        angle_v_delta Number Vertical angle in radians
